definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Many women dream of a sleek and refined face contour.
sentences.chinese: 拥有一张纤细清秀的瓜子脸是众多女士的梦想。

sentences.english: She is a typical frame, a small nose and mouth wide.
sentences.chinese: 她是一个典型的瓜子脸，小鼻子，嘴巴有点宽。

sentences.english: She has got an oval face, with wavy hair and a pair of big eyes.
sentences.chinese: 她有一张瓜子脸，波浪形的头发，一对大眼睛。

sentences.english: The news anchor has an oval face, and is very cameragenic.
sentences.chinese: 这位新闻主播有张瓜子脸，在镜头前很上相。

sentences.english: Her oval face makes her photogenic during photo-taking.
sentences.chinese: 她的瓜子脸让她拍照时很上相。

sentences.english: There are many ways a face-lift, how can a simple shape melon face it?
sentences.chinese: 瘦脸方法有很多，怎样才能简单塑造瓜子脸呢？

definition: five sense organs of TCM (nose, eyes, lips, tongue, ears 鼻目口舌耳)/facial features
red phoenix eyes (eyes whose outer corners incline upwards)
lit. cherry mouth (idiom)/fig. a delicate, ruby-lipped mouth
variant of 臉型|脸型, shape of face/physiognomy
to have bright eyes and white teeth
